Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the assessor of the town of Smithtown, county of Suffolk, to accept from Mother and Unborn Baby Care of LI, Inc., an application for exemption from real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the assessor of the town of Smithtown, county of Suffolk, to accept from Mother and Unborn Baby Care of Long Island, Inc., an application for exemption from real property taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the assessor of the town of Smithtown, county of Suffolk, to accept from Mother and Unborn Baby Care of LI, Inc., an application for exemption from real property taxes
